snippet: A bathroom fight on Friday among football players from Winston-Salem State and Virginia State during a pregame luncheon left the Winston-Salem quarterback beaten.
abstract: Bathroom fight among football players from Winston-Salem State and Virginia State during a pregame luncheon leads to cancellation of game between teams; Winston-Salem quarterback Rudy Johnson is viciously beaten, and Virginia State running back Lamont Britt has been held on misdemeanor assault charge.
lead_paragraph: A bathroom fight on Friday among football players from Winston-Salem State and Virginia State during a pregame luncheon left the Winston-Salem quarterback beaten.

headline.main: Fight Leads to Cancellation of Conference’s Title Game
headline.print_headline: Fight Leads to Cancellation Of Conference’s Title Game
